nostr.whatIsNostrDesc: Nostr la mot giao thuc phi tap trung cho mang xa hoi va danh tinh. Khac voi dang nhap truyen thong, danh tinh cua ban khong bi kiem soat boi bat ky cong ty nao - ban so huu khoa cua minh.
nostr.whatIsNip07Desc: NIP-07 la mot tieu chuan cho phep cac trang web yeu cau khoa cong khai Nostr cua ban tu tien ich mo rong trinh duyet. Dieu nay co nghia la:
nostr.cryptoSecure: Danh tinh cua ban duoc bao mat bang mat ma
nostr.controlKeys: Ban kiem soat khoa cua minh
nostr.step1: Cai dat tien ich mo rong ky Nostr (chung toi khuyen nghi Alby)
nostr.step2: Nhan "Ket noi voi Nostr" o tren
nostr.step3: Chap nhan ket noi trong tien ich mo rong cua ban
nostr.dontHaveExtension: Chua co tien ich mo rong Nostr? Lay tai day:

adminAI.title: Cau hinh AI
adminAI.subtitle: Kiem soat cach AI hoat dong va phan hoi nguoi dung cua ban
adminAI.promptTemplateDesc: Dinh hinh cach AI giao tiep voi nguoi dung cua ban
adminAI.promptTemplateHint: Cac cai dat nay xac dinh tinh cach va gioi han cua AI. Thay doi co hieu luc ngay lap tuc cho cac cuoc tro chuyen moi.
adminAI.parametersDesc: Tinh chinh chat luong phan hoi cua AI
adminAI.parametersHint: Cac cai dat ky thuat nay anh huong den toc do va chat luong phan hoi. Mac dinh hoat dong tot cho hau het cac truong hop - chi dieu chinh neu ban nhan thay van de.
adminAI.sessionDefaultsDesc: Dat cac tinh nang nao duoc bat mac dinh
adminAI.sessionDefaultsHint: Kiem soat cac kha nang AI nao duoc bat khi nguoi dung bat dau phien chat moi.
adminAI.documentDefaultsDesc: Kiem soat tai lieu nao AI co the tham chieu
adminAI.documentDefaultsHint: Tai lieu danh dau "Co san" co the duoc nguoi dung chon. Tai lieu danh dau "Mac dinh hoat dong" duoc tu dong dua vao cac cuoc tro chuyen moi.
adminAI.noDocuments: Chua co tai lieu nao duoc tai len
adminAI.invalidJson: Dinh dang JSON khong hop le

adminDeployment.serviceHealthHint: Mau xanh la dich vu dang phan hoi binh thuong. Neu dich vu hien thi mau do, kiem tra cau hinh cua no ben duoi.
adminDeployment.restartRequired: Can khoi dong lai dich vu

adminDeployment.validationFailed: Yeu cau xac thuc that bai
adminDeployment.leaveEmptyForSecret: De trong de giu gia tri hien tai

upload.invalidFileType: Loại tệp không hợp lệ. Cho phép: {{extensions}}
upload.title: Tai len tai lieu
upload.subtitle: Them tai lieu vao co so kien thuc de RAG
upload.dropOrBrowse: Tha tep vao day hoac nhan de duyet

llm.label: Nha cung cap AI
llm.description: Ket noi voi dich vu AI cua ban
llm.hint: Cau hinh dich vu AI nao cap nguon cho tro ly cua ban. Ban se can khoa API tu nha cung cap da chon (vi du: OpenAI, Anthropic). Thay doi can khoi dong lai dich vu de co hieu luc.

embedding.label: Xu ly van ban
embedding.description: Cau hinh cach tai lieu duoc phan tich
embedding.hint: Cac cai dat nay kiem soat cach tai lieu cua ban duoc chuyen doi thanh du lieu co the tim kiem. Mac dinh hoat dong tot cho hau het cac truong hop - chi thay doi neu ban dang su dung mo hinh tuy chinh.

email.label: Dich vu email
email.description: Thiet lap email de xac thuc nguoi dung
email.hint: Cau hinh email de gui lien ket ma thuat cho nguoi dung khi dang nhap. Ban se can thong tin SMTP tu dich vu email nhu SendGrid, Mailgun hoac may chu thu cua rieng ban.

storage.label: Luu tru du lieu
storage.description: Cau hinh noi du lieu duoc luu tru
storage.hint: Kiem soat duong dan tep cho co so du lieu va tai lieu da tai len. Thong thuong khong can thay doi tru khi ban dang tuy chinh trien khai cua minh.

security.label: Bao mat & URL
security.description: Cau hinh truy cap va cai dat bao mat
security.hint: Dat URL cong khai va tuy chon bao mat cua ban. URL frontend la noi nguoi dung truy cap ung dung. Dam bao chung khop voi trien khai thuc te cua ban.

search.label: Tim kiem web
search.description: Bat kha nang tim kiem web cua AI
search.hint: Cau hinh cong cu tim kiem cap nguon cho tinh nang tim kiem web cua AI. Khi duoc bat, AI co the tim kiem thong tin hien tai tren mang.

general.label: Chung
general.description: Cac tuy chon cau hinh khac
general.hint: Cac cai dat khong thuoc cac danh muc khac.

prompt_tone.label: Giong dieu & Tinh cach
prompt_tone.hint: Dieu nay dat giong noi va cach thuc tong the cua AI. Vi du, ban co the muon no "am ap va ho tro" cho ung dung tu van, hoac "ngan gon va chuyen nghiep" cho cong cu kinh doanh. AI se su dung dieu nay lam huong dan cho moi phan hoi.
prompt_tone.placeholder: Huu ich, ngan gon va chuyen nghiep...

prompt_rules.label: Quy tac hanh vi
prompt_rules.description: Huong dan cu the AI phai tuan theo
prompt_rules.hint: Them quy tac duoi dang danh sach JSON nhu ["Luon trich dan nguon", "Giu phan hoi duoi 200 tu"]. Day la cac huong dan chac chan AI se co gang tuan theo trong moi cuoc tro chuyen.

prompt_forbidden.label: Chu de cam
prompt_forbidden.description: Chu de AI nen tu choi thao luan
prompt_forbidden.hint: Liet ke cac chu de ban muon AI lich su chuyen huong. Vi du, ["loi khuyen y te", "tu van phap ly"]. AI se xac nhan cac yeu cau nay nhung giai thich khong the giup duoc.

prompt_greeting.label: Phong cach phan hoi
prompt_greeting.description: Cach AI cau truc phan hoi cua no
prompt_greeting.hint: Kiem soat so thich dinh dang nhu su dung dau cham, tieu de hoac doan van hoi thoai. Dieu nay anh huong den cach cau tra loi duoc trinh bay truc quan.
prompt_greeting.placeholder: Su dung dau cham cho danh sach, tieu de cho cac phan...

temperature.label: Muc do sang tao
temperature.description: Phan hoi AI co the doan truoc hay sang tao nhu the nao
temperature.hint: Gia tri thap (0.0-0.3) lam phan hoi tap trung va nhat quan hon - tot cho hoi dap thuc te. Gia tri cao (0.7-1.0) lam phan hoi da dang va sang tao hon - tot hon cho dong nao. Mac dinh: 0.7

top_k.label: Do sau kien thuc
top_k.description: Bao nhieu phan tai lieu de tham chieu
top_k.hint: Khi tra loi cau hoi, AI tim kiem tai lieu da tai len cua ban va lay cac phan lien quan. So cao hon nghia la nhieu ngu canh hon nhung phan hoi cham hon. So thap hon nhanh hon nhung co the bo lo thong tin lien quan. Mac dinh: 5

web_search_default.label: Tim kiem web
web_search_default.description: Cho phep AI tim kiem internet
web_search_default.hint: Khi duoc bat, AI co the tim kiem web de lay thong tin hien tai khong co trong tai lieu cua ban. Tat dieu nay neu ban muon phan hoi chi den tu co so kien thuc da tai len.

promptPreview.sampleQuestion: Tôi nên biết gì về chủ đề này?

LLM_PROVIDER.label: AI Service
LLM_PROVIDER.hint: Choose "maple" for the Maple proxy (recommended for privacy) or "ollama" for local models.

LLM_MODEL.label: Model Name
LLM_MODEL.hint: The model identifier to use (e.g., "kimi-k2-thinking"). Check your provider's documentation for available models.

LLM_API_URL.label: API Endpoint
LLM_API_URL.hint: The base URL for API requests. For Maple: http://maple-proxy:8080/v1. For Ollama: http://localhost:11434.

RAG_TOP_K.label: Context Chunks
RAG_TOP_K.hint: How many document chunks to retrieve for each query. Higher = more context but slower. Default: 8.

PDF_EXTRACT_MODE.label: PDF Processing
PDF_EXTRACT_MODE.hint: "fast" extracts text quickly. "quality" uses OCR for better accuracy with scanned documents but is slower.

EMBEDDING_MODEL.label: Embedding Model
EMBEDDING_MODEL.hint: The HuggingFace model for converting text to vectors. Only change if you need a different language or domain.

SMTP_HOST.label: Mail Server
SMTP_HOST.hint: Your SMTP server address (e.g., smtp.gmail.com, smtp.sendgrid.net).

SMTP_PORT.label: Mail Port
SMTP_PORT.hint: Usually 587 for TLS or 465 for SSL. Check your email provider's settings.

SMTP_USER.label: SMTP Username
SMTP_USER.hint: Your email service username or API key.

SMTP_PASS.label: SMTP Password
SMTP_PASS.hint: Your email service password or API key secret.

SMTP_FROM.label: Sender Address
SMTP_FROM.hint: The "from" address for outgoing emails (e.g., noreply@yourdomain.com).

MOCK_SMTP.label: Test Mode
MOCK_SMTP.hint: When "true", emails are logged instead of sent. Useful for development.

SQLITE_PATH.label: Database File
SQLITE_PATH.hint: Path to the SQLite database file. Default: /data/sanctum.db

UPLOADS_DIR.label: Uploads Folder
UPLOADS_DIR.hint: Directory where uploaded documents are stored. Default: /uploads

QDRANT_HOST.label: Vector DB Host
QDRANT_HOST.hint: Hostname for the Qdrant vector database. Default: qdrant

SEARXNG_URL.label: Search Engine URL
SEARXNG_URL.hint: URL of your SearXNG instance for web search functionality.

FRONTEND_URL.label: App URL
FRONTEND_URL.hint: The public URL where users access the app. Used for generating magic links.
